Classes in org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.loadbalancer.policies.createtable used by org.objectweb.cjdbc.controller.loadbalancer.policies.createtable
CreateTableException
          A CreateTableException is thrown when a CreateTableRule policy cannot be applied in the rule.getBackends() method.
CreateTableRule
          Defines the policy to adopt when creating a new table.
